entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is outraged and has his ears resembling curls of raw beef.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: Michael Corner is mentioned as the person Ginny is going out with.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the sister of Ron and the one who told Michael what was going on.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who composedly explained to Ron about Ginny and Michael.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who followed Hermione into Scri venshaft’s Quill Shop.

relationships.description: Hermione knows about Ginny and Michael’s relationship.
Harry visited Scri venshaft’s Quill Shop with Hermione.
